title: OÃ¹ est la plume de ma Kickstarter? with Taylor Levy and Che-Wei Wang
description: Taylor Levy and Che-Wei Wang run CW&T, an art and design studio that produces an array of items ranging from purely commercial to completely aesthetic. The way they string projects along that spectrum offers a lot of insight into how one can fulfill one's own artistic vision in a world of commerce. They're also the team behind the Pen Type-A, a large and ultimately complicated Kickstarter project that we'll get.
itunes:author: Glenn Fleishman
